summary: A comprehensive pytest test suite for the project's AWS Batch integration. It includes mockedâ€‘AWS (Moto) tests covering compute environments, job queues, job submission and lifecycle, scheduling policies, resource tagging, task definition handling, server endpoints, and utility functions, ensuring each Batch operation behaves as expected.
